title: Princess Charlotte's First Day Of School Pictures Are Royally Adorable
text:
Princess Charlotte has started school!

The 4-year-old royal was filmed arriving at the private Thomas’s Battersea in London on Thursday morning:

Princess Charlotte arrives for her first day of school at Thomas’s Battersea, joining her older brother Prince George. ✏️📚🏫 pic.twitter.com/8l63WEjzcw — Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) September 5, 2019

She held hands with her mom, the Duchess of Cambridge, Kate Middleton.

Prince George, 6, who also attends the school, walked with his father, the Duke of Cambridge, Prince William, in the images.

William said his daughter was “very excited,” reported London’s Evening Standard newspaper.

Princess Charlotte, accompanied by The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge and Prince George arrives for her first day of school at Thomas's Battersea.



📷 @PA pic.twitter.com/y7syX2vINg — Elliot Wagland (@elliotwagland) September 5, 2019

Princess Charlotte waves as she arrives for her first day at school.



📷 @PA pic.twitter.com/qWCIAoyzry — Elliot Wagland (@elliotwagland) September 5, 2019

Helen Haslem, head of the lower school greets Princess Charlotte.



📷 @PA pic.twitter.com/YQYMBuUUE9 — Elliot Wagland (@elliotwagland) September 5, 2019

Princess Charlotte enters the school for her first day at Thomas's Battersea.



📷 @PA pic.twitter.com/SFtfwutOwJ — Elliot Wagland (@elliotwagland) September 5, 2019
description: The Duke of Cambridge said his daughter was "very excited."
